name: The Pityme Inn
subtitle: Restaurant · Bar · Accommodation · Village shop · Takeaway

description.sentence: Perfectly located a mile from the beach at Rock
description.full:
The Pityme Inn has been a pub in the village since 1970, prior to that the site was part of a farm, then a tea room, restaurant and finally a pub. We took over The Pityme Inn in late 2018 & have been working hard with our team to make the pub the best it can be. We have carried out extensive renovations both inside and out and introduced an outside kitchen, takeaway options and even a village shop! We work closely with local suppliers to bring the best of Cornwall to your plate and glass. We are passionate about locally sourced produce & where ever possible this is on our menu, from fresh fish, meat and vegetables to bread, eggs and cheese. Our bar is fully stocked with a wide selection of gins, rums & local spirits & we pride ourselves on our award winning selection of St Austell ales. 

We also offer over night accommodation in our 4 en-suite King-size rooms. We are open from 9am serving food throughout the day so whenever you are passing you are sure of a warm welcome.

Families and dogs are always welcome.

parking: Plenty of free parking spaces available.

menus.overview: Here are our menus made using locally sourced ingredients where possible. We pride ourselves on creating our menus with our passionate team of chefs who work with local suppliers to source the best ingredients.

dishes.name: Paté di Fegatini
dishes.description: Home-made Chicken Liver Paté served with Rustic Sicilian Bread and Relish.

dishes.name: Mousse di Sgombro
dishes.description: A traditional Ligurian recipe of Smoked Mackerel Paté with Focaccia and Horseradish.

dishes.name: Capesante alla Martini
dishes.description: Seared King Scallops served in a Martini Creamy Sauce on our home-made Crostino.

dishes.name: Insalata Caprese GF
dishes.description: Sliced Beef Tomato, Mozzarella and Rocket with a drizzle of Virgin Olive Oil and Oregano / or with Avocado.

dishes.name: Gamberoni alla Spagnola
dishes.description: Tiger Prawns pan-seared with Garlic, Fresh Parsley, Butter and Lemon Sauce.

dishes.name: Grigliata di Ortaggi e Verdure
dishes.description: Grilled mixed Vegetables marinated in Extra Virgin Olive Oil and Vinegar.

dishes.name: Spaghetti alle Vongole
dishes.description: Spaghetti Tomates de San Marzano & Basilico.

dishes.name: Ravioloni all'Aragosta
dishes.description: Homemade Pasta Parcels of Lobster and Ricotta, in its Bisque Sauce and Shrimps.

dishes.name: Linguine Montalbano
dishes.description: Pasta with half dozen of King Prawns, Garlic, Chilli and little bit of Tomato Sauce.

dishes.name: Risotto ai Funghi Porcini
dishes.description: Carmaroli Rice cooked in White Wine with Shallots and Porcini Mushrooms, drizzled with Truffle Oil, sprinkled with flakes of Parmigiano, topped with Wild Rocket.

dishes.name: Agnolotti d'Agnello
dishes.description: Homemade Pasta Parcels filled with young Welsh Lamb, served in a Velvety Red Wine, fresh Rosemary and Garlic Sauce.

dishes.name: Malfatti Salsiccia e Rucola
dishes.description: Homemade twist Pasta with Tomato Sauce, Luganica Sausage, Garlic, Chillies and Wild Rocket.

dishes.name: Tortino appiccicoso
dishes.description: Sticky Toffee Pudding coated in warm Butterscotch sauce and served with Vanilla ice cream.

dishes.name: Affogato al Caffè Liquoroso
dishes.description: A Trio of Vanilla ice cream with Espresso Coffee and a shot of Strega or Disaronno liqueur.

dishes.name: Tiramisù (Individual Glass Portion)
dishes.description: Our version of this classic Italian dessert.

reservations.info: We are lucky enough to have lots of outside space for you to enjoy. We now have 4 outside heated dining pods on our decked garden for you to enjoy all year round. Or if you fancy a quick bite to eat, or takeaway our outside kitchen has everything you need.
reservations.groups: For group reservations of more than 6 people, please call first.
reservations.private: We have several spaces than we can offer for private functions ranging from 10 to 100 seats.
